title: 107_hr2140
content: FEES FOR CUSTOMS INSPECTIONS AT EXPRESS COURIER FACILITIES. Customs User Fees under Section 13031 of the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985 are amended to include a $5.50 fee for processing merchandise informally entered or released at centralized hub or express consignment carrier facilities, excluding shipments valued at $200 or less. The text chunk discusses amendments to subsection (b) related to Customs User Fees under Section 13031 of the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985. Amendments include changes in paragraph numbers and subparagraph references. Amendments to subsection (b) of Customs User Fees under Section 13031 of the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985 involve changes in paragraph numbers and subparagraph references, including modifications to subparagraph (9) by removing specific clauses and redesignating subclauses. Amendments to subsection (b) of Customs User Fees under Section 13031 of the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985 involve changes in paragraph numbers and subparagraph references, including modifications to subparagraph (9) by removing specific clauses and redesignating subclauses. The term 'small airport or other facility' is defined for the purposes of this paragraph as any airport or facility to which section 236 of the Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 applies, if more than 25,000 informal. The Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 applies to airports or facilities with over 25,000 informal entries cleared in the previous fiscal year. Subsection (c) defines 'centralized hub facility' and 'express consignment carrier facility' as specialized facilities for examination and release of imported merchandise. Subsection (d)(4) is amended to replace references to (a)(7) with (a)(8). The Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 applies to specialized facilities for examination and release of imported merchandise. Subsection (e) is amended to provide services by the United States Customs Service at no cost to such facilities. Subsection (f)(3)(A) is amended to update references. The Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 amends subsection (e) to provide services at specialized facilities for imported merchandise examination and release. It also updates references in subsection (f)(3)(A). Additionally, there are amendments to subsection (f)(6) and a conforming amendment to Section 301(b)(2)(B) of the Customs Procedural Reform and Simplification Act of 1978. The Customs Procedural Reform and Simplification Act of 1978 is amended to include new subsections (10) and (11), replacing subsections (9) and (10).
